S.FORM: D vis Bert ns D vis Bert ns hya'ga NBA pgnaw' mari' misuw qaniy, qutux sa pzyang pkaki' tay kska'. kawas tay 1992, ryax sa tay 12 nqu tay 11, D vis Bert ns, squliq na p'unro. 1992 kawas 11 byacing 12 ryax,D vis Bert ns htgan beh Latvijas Republika unro' ngasal. qsuyan mlikuy ru yaba qutux mari punro.hiya qsuyan milky raral ga maki New Orleans Pelicans,hiya yaya ga,qutux sinsiy ru wagiq punro'. Bert ns trang laqi ga,maki R jiena suruw lga musa R ga.hiya baq kmal ke' na Serbian. pincyugan nya Riga 2007 2008 kawas pspung ryax, Bert ns maki ASK Kadeti II . 2008 2010 kawas hiya maki Latvia's pspung BAA Riga.raral ga, hiya maki 2008 2009 kawas pspung ASK Riga hlahuy ru 2009 2010 kawas pspung BK Keizarmezs tmwang sazing wagiq msqun pspung. Union Olimpija ru BK Barons msqun t'ring 2010 2011 kawas lga,2010 kawas 11 byacing pspung, Bert ns ru Slovenian hlahuy(Union Olimpija) biru. 2010 2011 kawas pspung lga, Bert ns te 42 Indiana magal maki 2011 kawas. pincyuwagan nya' ryax qnxan nqu D vis Bert ns sa senmung pgnawgan mari'.
